channel.title: CVE Feed for E4J s.r.l. -- VikBooking Hotel Booking Engine & PMS (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for E4J s.r.l. -- VikBooking Hotel Booking Engine & PMS (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-27863|2024-08-03T05:41:10.382Z -- e4j%20s.r.l. -- vikbooking%20hotel%20booking%20engine%20%26%20pms%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Sensitive Information Exposure in E4J s.r.l. VikBooking Hotel Booking Engine & PMS plugin <= 1.5.3 on WordPress allows attackers to get the booking data by guessing / brute-forcing easy predictable booking IDs via search POST requests.

item.title: CVE-2022-27862|2024-08-03T05:41:10.224Z -- e4j%20s.r.l. -- vikbooking%20hotel%20booking%20engine%20%26%20pms%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Arbitrary File Upload leading to RCE in E4J s.r.l. VikBooking Hotel Booking Engine & PMS plugin <= 1.5.3 on WordPress allows attackers to upload and execute dangerous file types (e.g. PHP shell) via the signature upload on the booking form.
